elements.title: What were the classic communication channels for a long time?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What has permanently changed communication since the 1990s?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Which communication channel is one of the most important channels in business today?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What is the advantage in terms of content and language when communication is asynchronous?
elements.correctAnswer: There is time to check the content and language carefully.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What is a disadvantage in terms of confidentiality with emails?
elements.correctAnswer: The mails can easily reach people who should not read them.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What is the advantage in terms of information flow when communication is synchronized?
elements.correctAnswer: Everyone receives the same information at the same time.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What is a disadvantage in terms of verifiability in oral exchanges?
elements.correctAnswer: As a rule, no evidence is available.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What technical problems can occur with digital communication?
